expo.name: WasteRoute

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: WasteRoute uses your location to notify you when you are near houses on your route.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: WasteRoute uses your location to track your route and notify you when you are near houses on your route.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: WasteRoute uses your location to track your route and notify you when you are near houses on your route.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: WasteRoute uses your camera to scan route documents and take photos of completed waste collections. These photos can be attached to route reports as evidence of service completion.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: WasteRoute needs photo library access to upload images of collection sites and completed routes for documentation and reporting purposes.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized service recommendations based on your waste collection routes. We respect your privacy and never share your data with third parties.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: WasteRoute uses Face ID for secure authentication to protect your account and route data.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: WasteRoute uses your location to track your route and notify you when you are near houses on your route.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: WasteRoute uses your location to track your route and notify you when you are near houses on your route.

expo.description: Route management for waste collection services
